mapper.insert: insert into student (student_id, name, birth_date, gender, address, address_detail, zip_code, phone_no, email, student_status, entrance_year, user_id) values (#{studentId}, #{name}, #{birthDate}, #{gender}, #{address}, #{addressDetail}, #{zipCode}, #{phoneNo}, #{email}, #{studentStatus}, #{entranceYear}, #{userId});
insert into user (USER_ID, USER_TYPE, LOGIN_ID, USER_PW, FIRE_YN, CHANGE_PW_YN, PW_ERR_COUNT, REGIST_DATE) values (#{userId}, #{userType}, #{loginId}, #{userPw}, 'N', 'N', 0, NOW());
